com.moomoohk.Grame.Core

Class GrameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.moomoohk.Grame.Core.GrameObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chaser, Coin, Entity, Player, Spriteable, TestGrameObject, Wall

    public abstract class GrameObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Grame Objects are objects which are placed in Grids.
    Since:
    2013-04-05
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Meshulam Silk (moomoohk@ymail.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ID

        public final int ID
        The ID of this Grame Object.

        This ID is unique and cannot be changed.
        It is this object's place in the GrameManager's list of Grame Objects.

        protected java.lang.String name

        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of this object.
        speed - Speed of this object.

        paused - True to pause, else false.

        public boolean isPaused()

      • getPos

        public Coordinates getPos(int gID)
        Gets the position of this object in a certain Grid.
        If this object doesn't exist in the Grid null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        gID - Grid.ID of Grid.
        Returns:
        Coordinates of this object in the Grid. If this object isn't in the Grid, null will be returned.

      • setPos

        public void setPos(int gID,
                   Coordinates pos)
        Sets the position of this object in a certain Grid.
        Parameters:
        gID - Grid.ID of Grid.
        pos - New position to set.

      • isCollidable

        public abstract boolean isCollidable()
        Checks whether this object is collidable.

        If this object is collidable, other objects on the same GrameObjectLayer will not be able to occupy the same spot.
        If this object is not collidable, it will be consumed by any collidable object that tries to occupy its spot.

        Returns:
        True if collidable, else false.
        See Also:
        consume(GrameObject)

      • tick

        public abstract void tick(int gID)
        Ticks this object.

        Users will never need to call this method (The GrameManager takes care of ticking everything).

        Parameters:
        gID - The Grid.ID of the Grid in which to tick.

      • consume

        public abstract void consume(GrameObject go)
        This method gets called if this object is collidable and it tries to occupy the position of a non collidable object.
        Parameters:
        go - A non collidable Grame Object.
